onCreate.description: Called once the script was initialized.

onCreatePost.description: Called once the game has finished loading.

onDestroy.description: Called once the script is destroyed.

onBeatHit.description: Called every beat, use `curBeat` to get the current beat.

onStepHit.description: Called every step, use `curStep` to get the current step.

onSectionHit.description: Called every section, use `curSection` to get the section index.

onUpdate.description:
Called every frame before any logic updates.  
`elapsed` - the time between frames in seconds.

onUpdatePost.description:
Called every frame after all logic updated.  
`elapsed` - the time between frames in seconds.

onUpdateScore.description: Triggered every time score text updates.

onSongStart.description: Triggered once the song starts playing.

onMoveCamera.description:
Called whenever camera tries to change focus.  
`focus` - character it focuses on, can be either `boyfriend`, `dad` or `gf`.

onRecalculateRating.description:
Called right before the rating calculation.  
`return Function_Stop` prevents it from being calculated.

onCountdownTick.description:
Fires every countdown tick.  
`counter` - number value between 0 and 4.  
` 0 ` - "Three". ` 1 ` - "Two / Ready?".  
` 2 ` - "One / Set". ` 3 ` - "Three / GO!".  
` 4 ` - Song started.

onNextDialogue.description: Triggered when the next dialogue is called.

onSkipDialogue.description: Triggered when the dialogue is skipped mid text.

onGameOver.description:
Triggered before Game Over initialized.  
`return Function_Stop` can be used to prevent it.

onGameOverStart.description: Triggered after Game Over screen was created.

onGameOverConfirm.description: Triggered if player decides to retry or return to the menu.

onCustomSubstateCreate.description:
Same as onCreate() but for substates.  
`name` - the name that was given to the substate using `openCustomSubstate(name)`.

onCustomSubstateUpdate.description:
Same as onUpdate() but for substates.  
`name` - the substate name.  
`elapsed` - the time between frames in seconds.

onCustomSubstateDestroy.description:
Triggered when substate closes.  
`name` - the name of the substate that is being closed.

goodNoteHit.description:
Called when player hits a note.  
`index` - the note's id in unspawnNotes group.  
`noteDir` - 0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.  
`noteType` - type of the custom note.  
`isSustainNote` - true if its a note's tail part.

opponentNoteHit.description:
Called when opponent hits a note.  
`index` - the note's id.  
`noteDir` - 0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.  
`noteType` - type of the custom note.  
`isSustainNote` - true if its a note's tail part.

onSpawnNote.description:
Called when a note is spawned.  
`index` - the note's id.  
`noteDir` - 0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.  
`noteType` - type of the custom note.  
`isSustainNote` - true if its a note's tail part.

noteMiss.description:
Called when player misses a note.  
`index` - the note's id.  
`noteDir` - 0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.  
`noteType` - type of the custom note.  
`isSustainNote` - true if it was a note's tail part.

noteMissPress.description:
Called when player misses by tapping while ghost tapping is off.  
`noteDir` - 0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.

onKeyPress.description:
Called when player hits a key.  
`key` - corresponds to the note's direction,  
0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.

onKeyRelease.description:
Called when player releases a key.  
`key` - corresponds to the note's direction,  
0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.

onGhostTap.description:
Called when player ghost-taps a key.  
`key` - corresponds to the note's direction,  
0: left, 1: down, 2: up, 3: right.

onTimerCompleted.description:
Triggered on timer completion.  
`tag` - the tag that was given to the timer.  
`loops` - the amount of loops it have went through.  
`loopsLeft` - the amount of loops left.

onTweenCompleted.description:
Triggered once any tween completes.  
`tag` - the tag that was given to the tween.

onSoundFinished.description:
Triggered once any sound finishes.  
`tag` - the tag that was given to the sound.

defaultPlayerStrumX0.description: Default horizontal position of the player's left note.

defaultPlayerStrumX1.description: Default horizontal position of the player's down note.

defaultPlayerStrumX2.description: Default horizontal position of the player's up note.

defaultPlayerStrumX3.description: Default horizontal position of the player's right note.

defaultPlayerStrumY0.description: Default vertical position of the player's left note.

defaultPlayerStrumY1.description: Default vertical position of the player's down note.

defaultPlayerStrumY2.description: Default vertical position of the player's up note.

defaultPlayerStrumY3.description: Default vertical position of the player's right note.

defaultOpponentStrumX0.description: Default horizontal position of the opponent's left note.

defaultOpponentStrumX1.description: Default horizontal position of the opponent's down note.

defaultOpponentStrumX2.description: Default horizontal position of the opponent's up note.

defaultOpponentStrumX3.description: Default horizontal position of the opponent's right note.

defaultOpponentStrumY0.description: Default vertical position of the opponent's left note.

defaultOpponentStrumY1.description: Default vertical position of the opponent's down note.

defaultOpponentStrumY2.description: Default vertical position of the opponent's up note.

defaultOpponentStrumY3.description: Default vertical position of the opponent's right note.

playbackRate.description: The current playback speed of the song.

addHits.description: Adds hits and recalculates the rating.

addMisses.description: Adds misses and recalculates the rating.

addOffset.description: Adds offset to the sprite's animation. `tag` - the sprite's name to add offset to.

addScore.description: Adds score and recalculates the rating.

anyGamepadJustPressed.description: Checks if the gamepad's button just got pressed.

anyGamepadPressed.description: Checks if the gamepad's button is held.

anyGamepadReleased.description: Checks if the gamepad's button just got released.

callOnLuas.description: Calls an event on all lua scripts.

callScript.description: Calls an event in one lua script.

cameraFade.description: Fills the camera with solid color.

cameraFlash.description:
Flashes the camera with color.  
`camera` - the camera to flash, either `game`, `hud` or `other`.  
`color` - the hex color value formatted as `0xAARRGGBB` or `RRGGBB`.  
`duration` - the time it takes for flash to fade out.  
`forced` - whether to reset the flash and start over or skip if its still active.

getSongPosition.description: Returns the current song position in milliseconds.

makeLuaSprite.description:
Makes a sprite with the given tag, image and position.  
If sprite with that tag already exists, it gets replaced.  
`image` - path to the image like `bg-stuff/goober`. Leave empty and use **makeGraphic** function if you want to make a rectangle filled with solid color.

snippets.Disable Auto-Pause: setPropertyFromClass('flixel.FlxG', 'autoPause', false) -- Don't forget to turn it back on with onDestroy callback
